talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Nothing like going to stretch your legs
and ending up in the strangest place...

Everything looks the same down here.
It would be so easy to get turned around.

I wonder if the people who originally made
this place got lost in it all the time too.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:TalkPositive>What?<sp:5:0:0> If you're here about the <clr:0000>cooking
class<clr:ffff>, it isn't being held at the moment.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Before the sand shroud settled in, Ashai
was teaching a cooking class here.

You see, you can get really far in life—and
in love—if you have a solid grasp of the
essentials of cooking.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>But she has so many students now that
her other class, "Voe and You," takes up
all her time.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat>So she's opened this place up for
everyone's use.

The <clr:0000>cookbooks<clr:ffff> here are really useful too.
If you're planning to do any cooking at all,
you should definitely give them a read.
talk0003:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease><sp:0:2:2:6400>I thought there were supposed to be two
cookbooks here... Where could the other
one have gone?
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>I thought the <clr:0000>canteen <clr:ffff>was around here
somewhere...<sp:5:1:0> Huh?
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>What?<sp:5:0:0> I told you already—the <clr:0000>cooking
class<clr:ffff> isn't being held right now.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_00>Hey, what do you want? Were you lurking
in the shadows there, eavesdropping on
what I was saying?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh... You're that voe that everyone has
been talking about, right?

If I were younger, I might have been
surprised to see you here, but at my
age... <sp:5:0:0>Well, very little surprises me.
Disappointed that I wasn't shocked and
aghast at the very sight of you? Heh.

Anyway, I'm going to go. I'm feeling
a little parched, so maybe something
to drink at the <clr:0000>canteen<clr:ffff>...
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_01>Now then...<sp:5:0:0> I think I'll go track down
some <clr:0000>fruit <clr:ffff>or something.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh. You're that voe that folks have been
talking about. Have you already figured
out how to get around the shelter?
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I heard this place was built a long, long
time ago. I wonder if the people that
made it got lost in it too...
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_01>Now then... I think it's about time I put in
an appearance at the <clr:0000>canteen<clr:ffff>.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>I swear the <clr:0000>fruit shop<clr:ffff> was right around
here... <sp:5:1:0>Huh?
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you Yiga really have so little to do that
you can loiter around here?

Whatever. <sp:5:0:0>We won't have any trouble as
long as you stop bothering me. Right now.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad><sp:0:2:2:5000>Oh, no bananas at all... And here I was wanting to
make <clr:0000>fried bananas<clr:ffff> for the first time in a while.

Coat a banana in <clr:0000>Tabantha wheat<clr:ffff>, fry it, then mix in
a bit of <clr:0000>cane sugar<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Crispy on the outside, melted and gooey on the
inside... Great, I've made myself even more hungry
just thinking about it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>The shelter may be cramped, and I don't
think I'll ever actually like it... But at least
the canteen is all right.
After all, the back of this room is right
<clr:0000>under the jail<clr:ffff>, you know.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Hearing the sound of a voe's voice every
so often, even muffled through a wall,
makes all the drinks taste just a bit better.
BookNG: It cannot be read from here.
